product_name: J.Cat BeautyBeige Eyesurance Anti-Fatigue Cooling Under Eye Balm Persea Avocado Oil Extract
summary: SummaryWake up your eyes with J.Cat Beauty's Beige Eyesurance Anti-Fatigue Cooling Under Eye Balm Persea Avocado Oil Extract. It preps the skin for smooth makeup application.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydrating with vitamin A and EKey IngredientsPersea avocado oil extractItem 2565312How To UseApply Eyesurance Anti-Fatigue Cooling Under Eye Balm under the eye area and blend. Apply j.cat beauty staysurance concealer as usual and blend it out. Can be worn alone or under makeup for flawless finish.Precautions: Be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.IngredientsDimethicone (And) Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Paraffin, Hydrogenate Polydecene, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Titanium Dioxide CI 77891, Phenoxyethanol, Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Fragrance, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Ethylhexylglycerin, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil.
how_to_use: Apply Eyesurance Anti-Fatigue Cooling Under Eye Balm under the eye area and blend. Apply j.cat beauty staysurance concealer as usual and blend it out. Can be worn alone or under makeup for flawless finish.Precautions: Be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.

reviews.headline: Turns into oil on skin
reviews.comments: I wouldn't get this unless you are looking for a clear undereye oilâ€”if you're looking for color correction, coverage, or prep for makeup, this isn't for you

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: This works very well as good as high end and the price is right

reviews.headline: Works surprisingly well
reviews.comments: Typically I use the REM cooling under eye primer which works great. I saw this online and decided to order it and try it, and it worked surprisingly well for the price point.  It smooths and lightens the darkness under the eyes, and makes a great primer for concealer. The only con is that it definitely dose not have a cooling affect like REM dose, but for the price point this is a great dupe!

reviews.headline: Love this balm!
reviews.comments: I purchased all of these and have used every single one. They are smoothing and I can tell a difference with my concealer. I'm buying them again bc they fantastic!

reviews.headline: Doesn't do anything
reviews.comments: I have been using it for weeks and so far I haven't felt the cooling quality. or anything different. waste of money.

reviews.headline: Does nothing
reviews.comments: This product is so small and it, isn't cooling at all. It feels like a cheap lip balm under my eyes. It's very sticky and I have used it as says for the last two weeks and right under my eyes where some of the product has gone is broke out. It barely comes out of the pan. I really took a chance on this product and I am really disappointed.

rollup.name: Beige Eyesurance Anti-Fatigue Cooling Under Eye Balm Persea Avocado Oil Extract
